attributes.action: Demand that insurance companies give discounts for Thatcham approved devices
attributes.background: With motorcycle theft at an all time high, it has been found that insurance companies may not pass on any discounts for the fitment of Tatcham approved security devices. If discounts are given, more devices may get fitted helping to bring down the numbers that have been stolen, further reducing cost

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on insurance companies, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
